vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.22;
son of: Nahor (H5152H) and Milcah (H4435);
brother of: Uz (H5780H), Buz (H0938), Kemuel (H7055), Chesed (H3777), Hazo (H2375), Jidlaph (H3044) and Bethuel (H1328A);
half-brother of: Tebah (H2875), Gaham (H1514), Tahash (H8477) and Maacah (H4601)
§ Pildash = "flame of fire"
one of the 8 sons of Nahor, the brother of Abraham, by Milcah his wife or niece
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
必達 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "火焰"
亞伯拉罕的兄弟拿鶴和他的妻子所生的八個兒子之一 (創 22:22)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
必达 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "火焰"
亚伯拉罕的兄弟拿鹤和他的妻子所生的八个儿子之一 (创 22:22)
